syllabus_info.title: Cambridge IGCSE Information and Communication Technology

learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Edit page layout including page size, page orientation, page margins, number of columns, column width, spacing between columns, set and remove breaks (page, section and column breaks)

Set line spacing including: single, 1.5 times, double, multiple, spacing before and after paragraphs. Set tabulation including: left, right, centred and decimal tabs, indented paragraphs and hanging paragraphs. Text enhancement including bold, underline, italic, superscript and subscript, changes in case. Create or edit lists including bulleted, numbered
The purpose of setting page, section and column breaks
The purpose of setting gutter margins
